# NSCollectionView.UpdateAction.reload

**Case**

Reload the item, which consists of deleting and then inserting the item.

## Declaration

```swift
case reload
```

## Constants

- **NSCollectionView.UpdateAction.insert**: Insert the item into the collection view.
- **NSCollectionView.UpdateAction.delete**: Remove the action from the collection view.
- **NSCollectionView.UpdateAction.move**: Move the item from its current location to a new location.
- **NSCollectionView.UpdateAction.none**: Take no action on the item.
